pipeline_fixes.name: ICP Refinement
pipeline_fixes.description: Sharpen your Ideal Customer Profile to target high-intent buyers who convert faster and retain longer.
pipeline_fixes.impact: Reduces wasted pipeline by 30-40% and increases MQL-to-SQL conversion by 25%

pipeline_fixes.name: Lead Response Time Optimization
pipeline_fixes.description: Implement automated lead routing and instant follow-up systems to contact leads within 5 minutes.
pipeline_fixes.impact: Increases conversion rates by 21x when responding within 5 minutes vs 30 minutes

pipeline_fixes.name: MQL-to-SQL Conversion Process
pipeline_fixes.description: Build scoring criteria and handoff procedures between marketing and sales to qualify leads effectively.
pipeline_fixes.impact: Improves SQL acceptance rate from 60% to 85%+

pipeline_fixes.name: Pipeline Coverage Forecasting
pipeline_fixes.description: Establish 3-4x coverage ratio targets and implement weekly pipeline generation reviews.
pipeline_fixes.impact: Ensures predictable revenue and identifies gaps 60-90 days in advance

pipeline_fixes.name: Lead Velocity Tracking
pipeline_fixes.description: Monitor net new opportunities entering pipeline each month and track growth trends.
pipeline_fixes.impact: Provides early warning system for revenue gaps

conversion_fixes.name: Win Rate Analysis & Optimization
conversion_fixes.description: Analyze won vs lost deals to identify patterns, then build playbooks around winning behaviors.
conversion_fixes.impact: Increases win rates by 15-30% within one quarter

conversion_fixes.name: Sales Cycle Compression
conversion_fixes.description: Map your buyer journey, identify delays, and implement async decision-making tools (ROI calculators, comparison guides).

conversion_fixes.name: Demo-to-Proposal Conversion
conversion_fixes.description: Create discovery frameworks and qualification checklists to ensure demos lead to proposals.

conversion_fixes.name: Proposal-to-Close Optimization
conversion_fixes.description: Standardize pricing, terms, and negotiation parameters to reduce friction in final stages.
conversion_fixes.impact: Increases close rates by 20% and reduces discount pressure

conversion_fixes.name: Sales Rep Ramp Time Reduction
conversion_fixes.description: Build onboarding playbooks, certification programs, and shadowing schedules for new reps.
conversion_fixes.impact: Cuts ramp time from 6 months to 3-4 months

conversion_fixes.name: Quota Attainment Improvement
conversion_fixes.description: Analyze rep performance, set realistic quotas, and implement coaching programs for underperformers.
conversion_fixes.impact: Increases % of reps hitting quota from 40% to 70%+

expansion_fixes.name: Churn Reduction Program
expansion_fixes.description: Identify at-risk customers early through usage monitoring and implement save plays.

expansion_fixes.name: Net Revenue Retention (NRR) Optimization
expansion_fixes.description: Build expansion playbooks for upsells, cross-sells, and multi-year renewals.
expansion_fixes.impact: Increases NRR from 95% to 110%+ over 12 months

expansion_fixes.name: Time-to-First-Value Acceleration
expansion_fixes.description: Map onboarding journey and remove friction points so customers see value in 30 days or less.

expansion_fixes.name: Expansion Revenue Playbook
expansion_fixes.description: Create triggers for when to introduce upsells (usage milestones, renewal timing, new features).
expansion_fixes.impact: Grows expansion revenue from 5% to 20% of total revenue

expansion_fixes.name: Customer Health Scoring
expansion_fixes.description: Implement product usage tracking, NPS monitoring, and engagement scoring to predict churn.
expansion_fixes.impact: Enables proactive intervention 60-90 days before churn

expansion_fixes.name: NPS & Customer Feedback Loop
expansion_fixes.description: Establish regular customer surveys and close-the-loop processes to address feedback quickly.
expansion_fixes.impact: Increases NPS by 15-25 points and reduces feature request backlog

economics_fixes.name: CAC Payback Period Reduction
economics_fixes.description: Optimize pricing, reduce sales costs, and accelerate customer payments to improve payback time.
economics_fixes.impact: Reduces payback from 18 months to <12 months

economics_fixes.name: LTV:CAC Ratio Improvement
economics_fixes.description: Increase customer lifetime value through retention and expansion while reducing acquisition costs.

economics_fixes.name: Magic Number Optimization
economics_fixes.description: Balance sales & marketing spend with revenue generation to achieve sustainable growth efficiency.

economics_fixes.name: Rule of 40 Achievement
economics_fixes.description: Balance growth rate and profitability to achieve combined score of 40%+.
economics_fixes.impact: Positions company for Series B+ funding or profitability
